role.descr: end state of arg0, as result of laughing

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The ads have generated some laughs but also plenty of attention because they are so unlike any other U.S. auto advertising .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: The inclusion at one point , for example , of a list of glitzy modern-day malefactors , ranging from Jim Bakker and Leona Helmsley to Zsa Zsa Gabor , is a bid for a cheap laugh unworthy of Mr. Boyd 's ability .
example.arg: The inclusion at one point , for example , of a list of glitzy modern-day malefactors , ranging from Jim Bakker and Leona Helmsley to Zsa Zsa Gabor ,
